item.title: Welcome to Computer Engineering
item.description: Welcome! Hello and welcome to CG1111A! ðŸ™Œ Congratulations on getting into Computer Engineering! ðŸŽ‰ It was NOT easy getting here. Our IGP is pretty darn high. Now that you’re here, buckle up. Your academic career will see you touch MANY aspects of the computing world. You will explore a fair bit of the Computing world, from the lower levels e.g. Logic gates, transistors… of abstraction to the higher levels e.g. Algorithms, protocols .
